item.title: Dana add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "There's something undeniable about the posture of a person trying not to acknowledge your existance" -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Dana add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "My friendships have a certain symmetry at the moment: Alice is always asking me what she should do, and Nancy is always telling me what I should do." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Dana add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "Out lives, so settled, so specific, are built on happenstance." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Dana add a quote by Patrick Lencioni
item.description: ". . . his biggest problem was his need for a problem." -- Patrick Lencioni

item.title: Dana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The mirror reflects perfectly; it makes no mistakes because it doesn't think. To think is to make mistakes." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Dana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Success is both an addiction and an enslavement..." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Dana add a quote by Howard Schultz
item.description: "Grow with discipline. Balance intuition with rigor. Innovate around the core. Don't embrace the status quo. Find new ways to see. Never expect a silver bullet. Get your hands dirty. Listen with empathy and overcommunicate with transparency. Tell your story, refusing to let others define you. Use authentic experiences to inspire. Stick to your values, they are your foundation. Hold people accountable, but give them the tools to succeed. Make the tough choices; it's how you execute that counts. Be decisive in times of crisis. Be nimble. Find truth in trials and lessons in mistakes. Be responsible for what you see, hear, and do. Believe." -- Howard Schultz

item.title: Dana add a quote by Julie Metz
item.description: "Hypocrisy has its own elegant symmetry." -- Julie Metz

item.title: Dana add a quote by Don Miguel Ruiz
item.description: "Whatever happens around you, don't take it personally... Nothing other people do is because of you. It is because of themselves." -- Don Miguel Ruiz

item.title: Dana add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Ever morning, until you dead in the ground, you gone have to make this decision. You gone have to ask yourself, "Am I gone believe what them fools say about me today?" -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Dana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Dana add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "Who we are cannot be separated from where we're from." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: Dana add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "…the love we most cherish will, of necessity, bring us pain. Because that love is like the setting of a body with broken bones. But I want to stage the setting. I want to direct all scenes." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Dana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "When you are measuring life, you are not living it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Dana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Try to imagine a life without timekeeping. You probably can’t. You know the month, the year, the day of the week. There is a clock on your wall or the dashboard of your car. You have a schedule, a calendar, a time for dinner or a movie. Yet all around you, timekeeping is ignored. Birds are not late. A dog does not check its watch. Deer do not fret over passing birthdays. an alone measures time. Man alone chimes the hour. And, because of this, man alone suffers a paralyzing fear that no other creature endures. A fear of time running out." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Dana add a quote by Sheryl Sandberg
item.description: "Careers are a jungle gym, not a ladder." -- Sheryl Sandberg

item.title: Dana add a quote by Sheryl Sandberg
item.description: "Done is better than perfect." -- Sheryl Sandberg

item.title: Dana add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You know how sometimes, your life is so perfect you’re afraid for the next moment, because it couldn’t possibly be quite as good? That’s what it felt like." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Dana add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe you had to leave in order to really miss a place; maybe you had to travel to figure out how beloved your starting point was." -- Jodi Picoult
